name: Introduction to Chemical Thermodynamics and Kinetics: Theory and Practice
description: This course explores the concepts of chemical potential, phase equilibria, solutions, chemical equilibria (including electrochemical applications), elementary reactions, multi-step and coupled reactions (with biochemical applications), elementary collision theory and transition state theory.
prerequisites: CHMA10H3 and CHMA11H3 and MATA30H3 and [MATA35H3 or MATA36H3] and PHYA10H3
